title: Longitudinal study of secrets of the good life

content.description: Since 1938, researchers have examined the lives of 268 male college graduates to learn more about the secret of living a good life. Every two years participants complete questionnaires concerning many aspects of their lives, including their current physical and mental health.
content.question: Which of the following methods is being used by these researchers?

topic.text: 3.1: Themes and Methods in Developmental Psychology

skill.text: 2.A: Determine the type of research design(s) used in a given study.
